metadata.description: As you'll soon discover, Andrea Avery-Crusoe is not your typical comic book heroine.  She's amoral.  She lacks a strong sense of personal responsibility.  She's not all that interested in helping people who need her help.  Truth to tell, she's a villain who enjoys making life miserable for anyone who gets in her way.  So why did Heroic tape the Black Enchantress to star in our first new companion title to FLARE?  Because we think, one you meet her, you're going to fall in love.
metadata.name: Black Enchantress
